transcript: if you want a job at Mosey media don't say hey how can I provide value to Mosey media go take all the content that we have that's out there cut it up and demonstrate that you actually have the skill and are valuable and the cool thing is is that there is no timeline for how long it took you to do the thing and so you have the advantage of actually taking maybe more time than you otherwise would to make the thing awesome show the value don't talk about the value that you might someday deliver
